Package Controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Class that implements the controller for the actions of the players

  • Method Details

    • setRoomSize

      public void setRoomSize(int size, String playerName)
      Sets the room size only if the player that is trying to change it is the room leader
      Parameters:
      size - is the size to set
      playerName - is the name of the player that is trying to change the room size

    • join

      public void join(String playerName)
      Let a player join the room after checking if it is possible
      Parameters:
      playerName - is the name of the player to add

    • leave

      public void leave(String playerName)
      Let a player leave the mach
      Parameters:
      playerName - is the name of the player who requested to leave

    • chatMessage

      public void chatMessage(String playerName, List<String> receivers, String message)
      Sends a chat message to the player selected in the list
      Parameters:
      playerName - is the name of the player who is sending the message
      receivers - is the list of receivers
      message - is the message that has been sent

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(String playerName, List<PlanarCoordinate> planarCoordinateList)
      Checks all that is needed to withdraw and then does the action if it is possible
      Parameters:
      playerName - is the name of the player that is trying to withdraw
      planarCoordinateList - is a list of coordinates selected by the player

    • changeOrderOfCards

      public void changeOrderOfCards(List<Integer> orderList)
      Let the player change the order of cards if it's his turn
      Parameters:
      orderList - is a list of integer that represent the new order of the withdrawn cards

    • insert

      public void insert(String playerName, int column)
      Let the player insert the cards in the shelf if it's his turn
      Parameters:
      playerName - is the name of the player that is trying to insert the cards
      column - is the column selected to insert the cards

    • endgame

      public void endgame()
      Does all the action needed in the final phase of the match
